questions.question: At which vertebral level does the trachea bifurcate?
questions.explanation: The trachea bifurcates into the right and left main bronchi at the level of T4 (sternal angle/angle of Louis).

questions.question: Which heart valve is best heard at the 2nd intercostal space, right sternal border?
questions.explanation: The aortic valve is best heard at the 2nd intercostal space, right sternal border.

metadata.description: Thoracic cage, respiratory system, heart, and mediastinum
